resources.string: Goose liver terrine with cherry and palinka jelly in individual spoons, served with small brioche toasts and our first palinka shot
with parsley, paprika flakes, and rose pepper, served with crunchy toast
with ravioli stuffed with the meat cooked in the soup
with lemony chickpeas and smoky eggplant spread with labane (a special Druze yoghurt)
brown gravy sauce with wild mushroom, served with sweet potato gnocchi
with wine, and rose water, served with, goat cheese and yoghurt spread
